This code system http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v2-0216 defines the following codes:

name: PatientStatus
title: patientStatus
description: Code system of concepts used to define the state of a care episode for a patient.  Used in HL7 Version 2.x messaging in the PV2 segment.
purpose: Underlying Master Code System for V2 table 0216 (Patient Status Code)
